```js
<NavLink
  className={({ isActive }) => isActive ? 'loaded' : ''}
  style={({ isActive }) => isActive ? { color: 'red' } : undefined}>
    Some Link
</NavLink> 
```

```js
<NavLink
  to="/blog"
  style={({ isActive }) => isActive ? { color: 'red' } : undefined}
  **end**>
    Blog
</NavLink> 
```
